attributes.action: Stop the UK from profiteering from vulnerable children applying for citizenship
attributes.additional_details:
The UK charges 10 times more than any other European country for child citizenship applications. The government could make a profit of £5 million from these unacceptable charges.
https://www.theguardian.com/uk-news/2019/jun/19/uk-accused-profiteering-syrians-child-citizenship-fees
attributes.background: The UK government is choosing to profit £640 per application from vulnerable children applying for UK citizenship. This means that the government is driving Syrian families into poverty when they apply for citizenship - and are not being refunded if they do not get it. We must change this injustice.
